channel.title: Pasta on Math Life
channel.description: Recent content in Pasta on Math Life

item.title: Pasta verde
item.description: After a fair number of iterations this is the result of my cooking pasta with greens. At home we just call it Pasta Verde. This version is with Swiss chard but a real nice combination is dandelion leaves and Swiss chard. You can see how the various steps follow those for cooking a risotto. 1 Start preparing about an hour in advance a thick broth to use to cook the pasta.
